name: Fortune 500 Farming
description:
NOTE: Please play the in browser game in fullscreen mode since some features are not available through the WebGL build. If you would like the full experience please download the Windows build below. Have you ever wanted to escape your city life and own a farm? Well now you can! Play Fortune 500 Farming to have all the fun experiences of working on a farm to pay off your mortgage! CREATED BY

STEFAN KARABELOV - Programmer

TITO SHAJO - Programmer

MAX INGLETON - Programmer

SHIRIN ALI - Artist
